title: The Apollo 85 South Show Show #1 wit KarlousMiller, DCYoungFly, ChicoBean | Ep. 210
itunes:title: The Apollo 85 South Show Show #1 wit KarlousMiller, DCYoungFly, ChicoBean | Ep. 210
description:
Karlous Miller, Chico Bean and DC Young Fly pull up to the legendary Apollo Theater to deliver a classic comedy show like only they can! The funniest trio in the game hit the Apollo stage individually to deliver some stand-up comedy but later combine their power to bring the laughs together! They're dropping dope freestyles, roasting all the white people, reviving the sandman and paying homage to one of the most legendary venues in America - The Apollo Theater in Harlem in NYC! FOLLOW THE CREW KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/ DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/ CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/ JOE T. NEWMAN - http://www.ayoungplayer.com CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/ LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/ J.O.N - https://www.instagram.com/heeeyj_o_n/ CRIAG GRAVES - https://www.instagram.com/craigshoots23/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
